hero_heading: Empowering Fisheries Data for Sustainable Development in ECOWAS.
hero_description: Track, analyze, and manage country-level fisheries data in one unified platform.

features.description: Designed to make data-driven fisheries governance simple, secure, and scalable.
features.country_specific_dashboards_desc: Each ECOWAS nation gets a dedicated dashboard to manage and review fisheries data effectively.
features.secure_data_uploads_desc: Robust authentication and secure cloud storage to ensure data integrity and privacy.
features.real_time_analytics_desc: Instant insights to track patterns, trends, and performance metrics across the region.
features.centralized_oversight_desc: Admin panel for monitoring, managing permissions, and regional coordination.

flag_grid.select_country: Select a country below to access its fisheries dashboard

stories.title: Success Stories
stories.ghana_feedback: Ghana improved monthly fisheries reporting accuracy by 40% within six months using the platform.
stories.nigeria_feedback: The dashboard enabled real-time oversight and eliminated reporting delays across multiple states.
stories.senegal_feedback: Our local teams now submit verified catch data weekly, improving compliance and insights.

footer.company_description: Advancing sustainable fisheries management through data-driven solutions across West Africa.
